name: Rental Integration Sales Report
query:
select m.store_name as Store,t.external_type_name as Invoice_Type,
MONTHNAME(t.invoice_date) as Month, YEAR(t.invoice_date) as Year,sum(invoice_amount) as "Amount:Float:140" , sum(net_amount) as "Net_Amount:Float:140" 
from `tabRental Integration Sales` t
INNER JOIN `tabRental Integration Master` m  ON t.store=m.name
where t.invoice_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
group by m.store_name,t.external_type_name,YEAR(t.invoice_date), MONTH(t.invoice_date)
